resources.string: MadridGuide needs to connect to the Internet in order to download up-to-date information. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
"MadridGuide is about to download up-to-date information from the Internet (mobile data charges may apply).\n\nDo you want to proceed?"
Unable to download the shops data, please check your internet connection and try again.
"Some shop images could not be cached properly. Error count: "
Unable to store the shops data into the local cache, please try again.
